alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 12:04AM CST until January 16 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler
